title: cygan
author: cygan
created_time: April 03, 2023, 01:17:53 PMLast edit: April 05, 2023, 07:03:59 AM by cygan
content: unfortunately it is really true and it happened today.as i found out today, Xprim777 was called by yogg today and the bastard Patrick told him that all 21 playtoshi cards he is about to sweep.he found the pk's on his computer...https://www.blockchain.com/explorer/addresses/btc/bc1qplay4vkheyk4ayusmfrca46nawqvthdc66dlsghere is the official thread for this edition at that time: [AUCTION] PLAYTOSHI Coldkey - Bitcoin Toy 21 units ğŸ”‘ each of these 21 cards was loaded with 0.001 BTC each - unfortunately this bastard managed to sweep all still loaded ck-cardsi personally had after the halving set disaster completely wiped out all my cks

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: What a motherfucker! So he possibly held onto all the Private keys of all his creations!Â  Â Everyone should have swept all their items by now and not take any chances!Â  Â I swept all except for the bonds as I am still awaiting the locktime date to arrive...But will check them now and see if he swept mine!Â  Â What a piece of shit man!

comments.body: Quote from: cygan on April 03, 2023, 01:17:53 PM Xprim777 was called by yogg todayWhat was the point? Since Xprimm777 is in contact with them, can possibly trace the phone?

comments.author: YodasRedRocket
comments.body: Can't say this is surprising news but extra shitty because the playtoshi's were one of the cooler creations along with the halving sets.Â  As many have already said, save your bits & peel any ColdCuntz because he has all the keys.Â  This wasn't just 1 USB or hard drive with halving set keys.

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on April 03, 2023, 01:23:40 PMQuote from: cygan on April 03, 2023, 01:17:53 PM Xprim777 was called by yogg todayWhat was the point? yogg just wanted to let him know that he is about to sweep another editionQuote from: cygan on April 03, 2023, 01:17:53 PMSince Xprimm777 is in contact with them, can possibly trace the phone?i believe that this is not necessary.... Patrick must still be living in his scam-infested apartment.

comments.author: PreciousMetapsICT
comments.body: Can confirm my playtoshi was swept - I swept all my history sets myself but held out on the playtoshi and Diwali as the funding was so little - .001 and the premium was so large.

comments.author: polymerbit
comments.body: I will state this again: Peel the 10 year anniversary polymerbits. Keys were made by Patrick. We need to get him arrested.

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: If you were personally affected by this I think it's about time you try and get in contact with someone on the ground over there to take legal action. At this point it's actually a crime with intent and not just a one-off. I feel for you all who are losing out on this and if any doubts remained about whether or not you should peel, they have all but been answered by now.

comments.author: polymerbit
comments.body: Quote from: Hhampuz on April 03, 2023, 01:41:39 PMIf you were personally affected by this I think it's about time you try and get in contact with someone on the ground over there to take legal action. Personal damage, including loans have exceeded $10k. I don't want to even think how bad others have it.

comments.author: bitcoiner24h
comments.created_time: April 03, 2023, 04:25:05 PMLast edit: April 03, 2023, 04:41:10 PM by bitcoiner24h
comments.body: Hi, I confirm that my 5 Playtoshis were swept away by Yogg. I feel really sad and disappointed about everything that's happened. Playtoshi was a toy that I poured my heart into to make it last over time, and Yogg has destroyed it and even stolen the funds.I feel terrible about it. When I created Playtoshi, I didn't want to handle the upload process myself because I knew the community really trusted Yogg and not me, but I was completely wrong. everyone who has 1 playtoshi doesn't get rid of the toy, I'll think of something for playtoshi to survive.
